action.largeFetch: this action will attempt to fetch {{count}} items from your server

common.newVersion: a new version has been installed ({{version}})
common.forceRestartRequired: restart to apply changes… close the notification to restart
common.name: name
common.title: title

error.audioDeviceFetchError: an error occurred when trying to get audio devices
error.badAlbum: you are seeing this page because this song is not part of an album. you are most likely seeing this issue if you have a song at the top level of your music folder. Jellyfin only groups tracks if they are in a folder
error.badValue: invalid option "{{value}}". this value no longer exists
error.loginRateError: too many login attempts, please try again in a few seconds
error.notificationDenied: permissions for notifications were denied. this setting has no effect
error.playbackError: an error occurred when trying to play the media
error.remoteDisableError: an error occurred when trying to $t(common.disable) the remote server
error.remoteEnableError: an error occurred when trying to $t(common.enable) the remote server
error.remotePortError: an error occurred when trying to set the remote server port
error.remotePortWarning: restart the server to apply the new port
error.systemFontError: an error occurred when trying to get system fonts

addServer.error_savePassword: an error occurred when trying to save the password
addServer.input_preferInstantMixDescription: only use instant mix to get similar songs. useful if you have plugins that modify this behavior
addServer.title: add server

largeFetchConfirmation.title: add items to the queue
largeFetchConfirmation.description: This request will attempt to fetch {{count}} items from the server

addToPlaylist.searchOrCreate: search $t(entity.playlist_other) or type to create a new one
addToPlaylist.title: add to $t(entity.playlist_one)

deletePlaylist.input_confirm: type the name of the $t(entity.playlist_one) to confirm
deletePlaylist.title: delete $t(entity.playlist_one)

editPlaylist.publicJellyfinNote: Jellyfin for some reason does not expose whether a playlist is public or not. If you wish for this to remain public, please have the following input selected
editPlaylist.title: edit $t(entity.playlist_one)

shareItem.success: share link copied to clipboard (or click here to open)
shareItem.expireInvalid: expiration must be in the future
shareItem.createFailed: failed to create share (is sharing enabled?)

privateMode.enabled: private mode enabled, playback status is now hidden from external integrations
privateMode.disabled: private mode disabled, playback status is now visible to enabled external integrations
privateMode.title: private mode

playlist.reorder: reordering only enabled when sorting by id

player.playbackFetchCancel: this is taking a while… close the notification to cancel

setting.accentColor_description: sets the accent color for the application
setting.albumBackground_description: adds a background image for album pages containing the album art
setting.albumBackgroundBlur_description: adjusts the amount of blur applied to the album background image
setting.analyticsDisable_description: Anonymized usage data is sent to the developer to help improve the application
setting.applicationHotkeys_description: configure application hotkeys. toggle the checkbox to set as a global hotkey (desktop only)
setting.artistBackground_description: adds a background image for artist pages containing the artist art
setting.artistBackgroundBlur_description: adjusts the amount of blur applied to the artist background image
setting.artistConfiguration_description: configure what items are shown, and in what order, on the album artist page
setting.audioDevice_description: select the audio device to use for playback (web player only)
setting.audioExclusiveMode_description: enable exclusive output mode. In this mode, the system is usually locked out, and only mpv will be able to output audio
setting.audioPlayer_description: select the audio player to use for playback
setting.buttonSize_description: the size of the player bar buttons
setting.clearCache_description: a 'hard clear' of feishin. in addition to clearing feishin's cache, empty the browser cache (saved images and other assets). server credentials and settings are preserved
setting.clearQueryCache_description: a 'soft clear' of feishin. this will refresh playlists, track metadata, and reset saved lyrics. settings, server credentials and cached images are preserved
setting.contextMenu_description: allows you to hide items that are shown in the menu when you right click on an item. items that are unchecked will be hidden
setting.crossfadeDuration_description: sets the duration of the crossfade effect
setting.crossfadeStyle_description: select the crossfade style to use for the audio player
setting.customCss_description: custom css content. Note: content and remote urls are disallowed properties. A preview of your content is shown below. Additional fields you didn't set are present due to sanitization
setting.customCssNotice: Warning: while there is some sanitization (disallowing url() and content:), using custom css can still pose risks by changing the interface
setting.customFontPath_description: sets the path to the custom font to use for the application
setting.releaseChannel_description: choose between stable releases or beta releases for automatic updates
setting.disableLibraryUpdateOnStartup: disable checking for new versions on startup
setting.discordApplicationId_description: the application id for {{discord}} rich presence (defaults to {{defaultId}})
setting.discordDisplayType_description: changes what you are listening to in your status
setting.discordIdleStatus_description: when enabled, update status while player is idle
setting.discordLinkType_description: adds external links to {{lastfm}} or {{musicbrainz}} to the song and artist fields in {{discord}} rich presence. {{musicbrainz}} is the most accurate but requires tags and doesn't provide artist links while {{lastfm}} should always provide a link. makes no extra network requests
setting.discordListening_description: show status as listening instead of playing
setting.discordPausedStatus_description: when enabled, status will show when player is paused
setting.discordRichPresence_description: enable playback status in {{discord}} rich presence. Image keys are: {{icon}}, {{playing}}, and {{paused}}
setting.discordServeImage_description: share cover art for {{discord}} rich presence from server itself, only available for Jellyfin and Navidrome. {{discord}} uses a bot to fetch images, so your server must be reachable from the public internet
setting.discordUpdateInterval_description: the time in seconds between each update (minimum 15 seconds)
setting.enableAutoTranslation_description: enable translation automatically when lyrics are loaded
setting.enableRemote_description: enables the remote control server to allow other devices to control the application
setting.exitToTray_description: exit the application to the system tray
setting.exportImportSettings_control_description: export and import settings via JSON
setting.exportImportSettings_destructiveWarning: importing settings is destructive, please review the above before clicking "import" below!
setting.exportImportSettings_notValidJSON: the file passed is not valid JSON
setting.externalLinks_description: enables showing external links (Last.fm, MusicBrainz) on artist/album pages
setting.followLyric_description: scroll the lyric to the current playing position
setting.font_description: sets the font to use for the application
setting.fontType_description: built-in font selects one of the fonts provided by feishin. system font allows you to select any font provided by your operating system. custom allows you to provide your own font
setting.gaplessAudio_description: sets the gapless audio setting for mpv
setting.globalMediaHotkeys_description: enable or disable the usage of your system media hotkeys to control playback
setting.homeConfiguration_description: configure what items are shown, and in what order, on the home page
setting.homeFeature_description: controls whether to show the large featured carousel on the home page
setting.imageAspectRatio_description: if enabled, cover art will be shown using their native aspect ratio. for art that is not 1:1, the remaining space will be empty
setting.imageAspectRatio: use native cover art aspect ratio
setting.language_description: sets the language for the application ($t(common.restartRequired))
setting.lastfm_description: show links to Last.fm on artist/album pages
setting.lastfmApiKey_description: the API key for {{lastfm}}. required for cover art
setting.lyricFetch_description: fetch lyrics from various internet sources
setting.lyricFetchProvider_description: select the providers to fetch lyrics from. the order of the providers is the order in which they will be queried
setting.lyricOffset_description: offset the lyric by the specified amount of milliseconds
setting.minimizeToTray_description: minimize the application to the system tray
setting.minimumScrobblePercentage_description: the minimum percentage of the song that must be played before it is scrobbled
setting.minimumScrobbleSeconds_description: the minimum duration in seconds of the song that must be played before it is scrobbled
setting.mpvExecutablePath_description: sets the path to the mpv executable. if left empty, the default path will be used
setting.musicbrainz_description: show links to MusicBrainz on artist/album pages, where MusicBrainz ID exists
setting.neteaseTranslation_description: When enabled, fetches and displays translated lyrics from NetEase if available
setting.notify_description: show notifications when changing the current song
setting.passwordStore_description: what password/secret store to use. change this if you are having issues storing passwords
setting.playbackStyle_description: select the playback style to use for the audio player
setting.playButtonBehavior_description: sets the default behavior of the play button when adding songs to the queue
setting.playerAlbumArtResolution_description: the resolution for the large player's album art preview. larger makes it look more crisp, but may slow loading down. defaults to 0, meaning auto
setting.playerbarOpenDrawer_description: allows clicking of the playerbar to open the full screen player
setting.playerbarSlider: playerbar slider - the waveform is not recommended if using on a slow or metered internet connection
setting.preferLocalLyrics_description: prefer local lyrics over remote lyrics when available
setting.showLyricsInSidebar_description: a panel will be added to the attached play queue that displays the lyrics
setting.showVisualizerInSidebar_description: a panel will be added to the player sidebar that displays the visualizer
setting.preservePitch_description: preserves pitch when modifying playback speed
setting.audioFadeOnStatusChange_description: enables fade out and fade in when play/pause status changes
setting.preventSleepOnPlayback_description: prevent the display from sleeping while music is playing
setting.remotePassword_description: sets the password for the remote control server. These credentials are by default transferred insecurely, so you should use a unique password that you do not care about
setting.remotePort_description: sets the port for the remote control server
setting.remoteUsername_description: sets the username for the remote control server. if both username and password are empty, authentication will be disabled
setting.replayGainClipping_description: Prevent clipping caused by {{ReplayGain}} by automatically lowering the gain
setting.replayGainFallback_description: gain in db to apply if the file has no {{ReplayGain}} tags
setting.replayGainMode_description: adjust volume gain according to {{ReplayGain}} values stored in the file metadata
setting.replayGainPreamp_description: adjust the preamp gain applied to the {{ReplayGain}} values
setting.sampleRate_description: select the output sample rate to be used if the sample frequency selected is different from that of the current media. a value less than 8000 will use the default frequency
setting.savePlayQueue_description: save the play queue when the application is closed and restore it when the application is opened
setting.scrobble_description: scrobble plays to your media server
setting.showSkipButton_description: show or hide the skip buttons on the player bar
setting.showSkipButtons_description: show or hide the skip buttons on the player bar
setting.sidebarCollapsedNavigation_description: show or hide the navigation in the collapsed sidebar
setting.sidebarConfiguration_description: select the items and order in which they appear in the sidebar
setting.sidebarPlaylistList_description: show or hide the playlist list in the sidebar
setting.sidePlayQueueStyle_description: sets the style of the side play queue
setting.mediaSession_description: enables Windows Media Session integration, displaying media controls and metadata in the system volume overlay and lock screen (Windows only)
setting.skipDuration_description: sets the duration to skip when using the skip buttons on the player bar
setting.skipPlaylistPage_description: when navigating to a playlist, go to the playlist song list page instead of the default page
setting.startMinimized_description: start the application in system tray
setting.theme_description: sets the theme to use for the application
setting.themeDark_description: sets the dark theme to use for the application
setting.themeLight_description: sets the light theme to use for the application
setting.transcodeBitrate_description: selects the bitrate to transcode. 0 means let the server pick
setting.transcodeFormat_description: selects the format to transcode. leave empty to let the server decide
setting.translationApiKey_description: api key for translation (global service endpoint only)
setting.trayEnabled_description: show/hide tray icon/menu. if disabled, also disables minimize/exit to tray
setting.useSystemTheme_description: follow the system-defined light or dark preference
setting.volumeWheelStep_description: the amount of volume to change when scrolling the mouse wheel on the volume slider
setting.volumeWidth_description: the width of the volume slider
setting.webAudio_description: use web audio. this enables advanced features like replaygain. disable if you experience otherwise
setting.windowBarStyle_description: select the style of the window bar
setting.zoom_description: sets the zoom percentage for the application
setting.queryBuilderCustomFields_description: add custom fields to use in query builders

dragDropZone.error_readingFile: there has been an issue reading the file: {{errorMessage}}
